subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Marco Scutaro hit a tie-breaking grand slam in the eighth inning, and the Boston Red Sox wrapped up a 10-game West Coast trip with a 7-3 victory over the Los Angeles Angels on Wednesday, sweeping the three-game series.
snippet: Marco Scutaro hit a tie-breaking grand slam in the eighth inning, and the Boston Red Sox wrapped up a 10-game West Coast trip with a 7-3 victory over the Los Angeles Angels on Wednesday, sweeping the three-game series.
